participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: She is expressive, opinionated, and has a strong sense of self. Jessica tends to be direct and is not afraid to share her thoughts.
participant_1.background: my favorite toy as a child was my lite brite. I love New Kids on the Block. I take dance lessons once a week. I also like old school hip hop. I was born in the early 80s.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: They are friendly, open-minded, and enjoy engaging in social discussions. Alex values inclusivity and is passionate about social issues.
participant_2.background: I buy only organic food products. I love social media, especially Twitter. I spend a lot of time browsing the internet. I am a feminist.
